values:
Hey everyone!
I have a new journal...If you love me enough, please go add me and I'll add you back.  If you dont love me...well, thats too bad, I guess.
I will no longer be updating this journal, my journal from now on is <lj user="in_the_shade">
Love y'all!

Dammit, I fucking hate life.  The AFI show is sold out.  I can't beleive it.  I FINALLY get a chance to see one of my favorite bands live, and now I cant.  If my goddam parents havent taken so friggen long to say I could go, maybe I'd be seeing them.  It's so frustrating that they are going to be here, but I cant see them.

My parents always do this to me.  First Warped Tour, now this.

I never have anything to be happy about, I'm never excited or happy.  Then AFI comes here, and I get all excited that I can go, and I'm actually happy for once.  Which makes it even worse that now I haveta miss them.

My parents said yes!  I'm going to see AFI on October 19th!  I am going to SEE AFI!  LIVE!  OMG!  I'm so excited!  I can't breathe.  Okay... *inhail* *exhail*
Right...So my dad tells me that I get to go, but I haveta bring a cell and call them often, I have to get my own food and drinks (duh!  he thinks I dont know about date rape drugs.  im not an idiot.), and I cant go backstage (like I would get to anyway?).  Those rules should be easy enough to follow.
I am so not gonna sleep at all until after the concert.  
I'm going with Manny, and maybe Nikki.  I can't get through to Manny on the phone though...i just hope I can get tickets before they sell out.

Wow.  I was so spazzy last night.  I had like, a mental break down and started crying all over the place.

Right...I just read my last entry, and I have come to a conclusion:  I think too much.  I over-analyse.  Yup.  So Ive decided that I'm gonna stop that.  GC is still my favorite band...noone ever said you can only have one favorite, right?  So Silverchair, GC, AFI, and Rancid are all my fave bands.

Im getting a new journal soon...the name evil_riot_queen is starting to piss me off, its so cliche.  So I'll be getting the new one soon.

That's about it...I haveta go to school opening mass tomorrow.  ugh.

I'm becoming more Silverchair obsessive.
Dont worry, I'm not over my GC obsession or anything, I still love them to death, but lately I've been more able to listen to other bands.  So yeah...now I'm GC, Silverchair, Rancid and AFI obsessive.  I have too much time on my hands.

I feel like crap.

I'm still trying to get my 'rents to let me go to AFI...I'll just DIE if they dont let me.

I feel wierd right now...Ive been obsessed with GC for years...I feel like Im losing interest in them...i dont want to, I still love them...I just dont know what Im feeling right now.  They;re still one of my favorites, but Im not sure that they are my absolute favorite...Its hard to say that...Because I feel like Im betraying someone or something...  I dunno.  I think I just need to sleep, my head's starting to hurt.

HOLY FREAKIN HELL!  AFI is coming here!  HERE!  AFI!  OMG!  I haveta convince my parents to let me go...Manny's parents already said she could go.  I wish my parents would let me go as easily as her 'rents do.  AAAAAARG!  But I'll get them to let me go...they kept me from Warped, and Im not gonna let them do something like that to me again.
I MUST GO!

Im pissed beyong belief right now.  So I was talking to that so-hot-it-makes-me-sick guy, and it turns out he's going out with his girlfriend again.  They broke up for a while over the summer (I asked why, and he just said "Because I'm retarded"), but now they're together again.  ugh!!!!!

Is it just me, or did they change LiveJournal?  The layout's different.

Anyways, moving on...

Right, so this guy in my class, Im still not gonna name, is SO SEXY.  For real.  He's so hot it makes me wanna puke.  And I have to deal with that for 6 hours everyday, for the rest of the year!  He'll never like me.  He probably notices me, because I'm hard not to motice, but he'd never go for me.

Im still all depressed.  At home, everything is making me cry.  Not at school, because I never let them see me cry.  But at home, I just completely lose it.  Today, I flicked to MuchMusic, and "Youth of the Nation" by P.O.D was playing, and I started bawling, for no reason at all.

I didnt sleep again last night...Im so mentally tired, its not even funny.

I'm thinking of making my journal friends only, just because school has started again...Just in case someone I know comes across it.  I'd be so embarrassed.  I know it's paranoid, but still.  People laugh at me enough without reading all this.  If you're on my friends list, dont worry, I wont take you off.  I just have to find someone who will make me a pretty Friends Only banner.

Alright, thats about it.

Right, so today was the second day.  

We got our options...I'm in art and french, which is okay, I guess.  Atleast I'm not in world geography or leadership or extra gym.

It was actually pretty uneventful.  I was just alone, and I just did what I had to do to get through the day.  I dont know how long I can do that, though...I just felt so empty.  My so-called friend Anoushka is still acting like I dont exist...she's not mad at me, but she just picks the "popular kids" over me, even though they dont like her.

Yeah...so, I have CTS tomorrow, so I get to listen to music on the bus.  Im sitting alone, thats okay...I'll have all my boys (all of GC, Rancid, AFI and more) with me:)

There's this guy in my class, who will remain unnamed, who is SO HOT!  I mean hoooot.  He has the most gorgeous eyes (well, not THE most georgeous, that'd be Billy), and this great smile.  He's so funny.  Too bad I'm ugly and everyone hates me.  He probably doesnt even notice I exist.

All this shit, added to the fact that I'm not sleeping.  I literally think im an insomniac.  I can't sleep for more that half an hour at a time, and thats only every once in a while.  So every night, I sleep a grand total of about 2 hours.  And It just makes me even more tired of life.  I mean, how I can I run on that? 

This is all wearing me down, and I've only been back to school for two days.  How the hell am I going to make it through the whole year?

God, I hate life.

So today was the first day of grade nine.  Here we go...

Well, first of all, I'm in mr. davis' class.  He seems nice, but I really wanted Ms. Wade.  

I have noone in my class, except Anoushka, but she doesnt count.  I mean, she talks to me all the time at home and on the phone, but whenever there are other people around, she completely ignores me...like she's embarrassed to know me or something.  She didnt say a thing to me all day.

The guy I had a big crush on last year is in my class.  I dont like him anymore...but still.

I just feel like such a loser, because I didnt talk to anyone, and noone talked to me, unless we had to.  People just dont like me.  

There's this guy in my class who I think's really hot.  I dont know him that well, though, so I can't say i have a crush on him, I just think he's hot.  But it'd never happen anyways, because he's friends with poeple who dont like me.

My dad says I need to be more positive, or nothing good will happen to me.  He says if i think positive, people will wanna be around me or whatever.  Personally, for me, I think that being positive is like getting your hopes up, and just sets you up for a bigger fall when things dont go the way you want.

God, I just feel so sick.  I'm sick of life.  If I had the guts, I'd kill myself.  But I'm too chicken-shit.   So I just have to live with it.  It's hard.  And it hurts...but I cant fix it.

Right, so tomorrow's the first day of school.  I couldnt eat thinking about it, and I know I wont sleep tonight.  School is like hell for me.  I have to spend six and a half hours locked in a building where everyone hates me, I have to obey rules, do tests, work all day, and then come home and do homework.  If I had just one person who could be my friend, and stay by me, I think it would be alright.  Just one person to care about me, and to make me feel special and needed, someone to cheer me up, I would be fine.  But I dont.  I have noone.  And even though I'm used to it, that doesnt mean I'm content with it.

People dont understand me.  I know this sounds cliche, but its true.  They think that because I listen to punk rock, and I show it, I'm a punk, and a loser...which isnt fair, because Im not a punk, and even if I was, what's so wrong with that?  They think that just because Im a bit different, I dont want to have a friend.  And they dont bother to get to know me, because of what other people would think.

Im sick of being alone.  And I think that, even though I dont show it, its starting to get to me. 

So here we go again, another year that, no matter what I do, will just end up being the same as the rest.

So...what did I do today?  Well, rachel showed up at my house.  She's this girl I was really good friends with a couple years ago, but then she turned into a real bitch, then she moved.  She showed up acting all nice.  yeah, right.  And I swear, her bra was SO padded...for real.  Like, I dont really care, but you could TELL they were stuffed.  She's not good at it, the tissue paper was all bumpy.  rotflmao.

Listened to the Rancid CD some more...I was listening to that song about Brody...sad.  "If you lose me girl, you lose a good thing"... he can say THAT again!  Why anyone would ever leave Tim Armstrong is beyond me.

I made some of my own icons!  They suck, but atleast they're mine.  One is billy and daniel, one is Tim Armstrong, and one is just Billy.  All of them are animated.

I watched some movie last night...I have NO idea what it was, it was old...but there was this kid, probably my age, with long hair, and he was HOT!  

Tonight I'm watching TLOTR The Two Towers.

Thats about it.  Yeah.

Im bored...

Here's something random:  Daniel Johns is beautiful.

Alright, Ill shut up now.

<marquee><3Kat</marquee>

So...I got the new Rancid CD today.  it came with a Rancid shirt (one that i didnt already have, yay!) and a Rancid patch.  It's really good...not their best CD, but still awsome.  I love "Indestructible", its an awsome some, I love the words "through music we can live forever", because thats exactly my view.  And they say in the booklet that that song is for the Ramones, and in the song, it refers to Joe Strummer, and that just makes the song even better.

OMFG!  There are three really great bands coming here: No Use For A Name, Godsmack and finger eleven.  I wanna go to them all, but that wont happen, so I'm thinking I'll just go to No Use For A name, because they're the band I like most out of those three.  Now I just haveta convince my mom to let me go, and find someone to go with.  This wont be easy, because my mom is really overprotective, and because noone likes me enoguh to come with me:)

Yep, thats about it...yeah, it is.

Oh, except...Marky Ramone and the Speed Kings are coming here...wow, Marky Ramone.  Wow.

Im so pissed right now.  See, there are only two Canadian dates on GCs fall tour, right?  One of them is in Hamilton, Ontario.  I have family that lives about a 15 minute drive away from there.  If my parents would let me, I could go and stay with them and then go see it.  But they wont let me, so that idea is down the drain.

To make it worse, I just got an email from gc.com that gave me the password to get presale tickets for that show.  It just reminded me of it, and now Im even more depressed.

Plus Im PMS-y, so Im ready to rip someones head off.  Or break down crying, either one will do.
they won and billy kissed his girlfreind.  kinda sweet and sour at the same time.  joel shit his pants.  and DAMN benj is a mike hog!
BENJI KISSED PAUL BENJI KISSED PAUL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! then he made the cutest face:)

The VMA's are in about and hour and ten minutes.  Yayers!

Does anyone else find it a bit sad that they're creating GC dolls?  Althouh, I'll probably buy them anyways so I can make them do thinks to eachother;).  So naughty.

Anyways, thats about it.  Damn, Im bored.

OMG!  i LOVE CAUTERIZE!   I LOVE THEM!  check them out now!

Well, I'm back.
Camping was horrible.  Enough abou that, moving on...
I had the worst dream last night!  GC was in a car crash and Billy and Joel died!  I woke up crying.  I dunno what Id do if one of those guys died...I'd prolly go into a deep depression.

Can you guys see my layout?

Well, Im leaving tomorrow morning.
Another <s>horrible</s> camping trip.  I wont be back until the 24th.

So everyone make sure to comment lots while I'm gone and tell me how much you love me!!!
Yeah, right.

So, yeah, bye!
(I dont know how I'll survive 9 days without the internet.  But atleast I'll have my music.)

Who will you have sex with? by evil_riot_queen
name
whoBilly Martin
wherebackstage
whenJanuary 18, 2018
Created with quill18's MemeGen!
Who will you have sex with? by evil_riot_queen
name
whoBilly Martin
wherea bathroom
whenJune 4, 2022
Created with quill18's MemeGen!
I got Billy both times! And when I put my last name, I get Tim Armstrong. Yummy. Gonna have happy dreams tonight.

Im bored.  Turned out we're actually leaving tomorrow morning.

<lj-cut text="survey">Stolen from: _eyeroll

Your name backwards: enirehtaK

Last song you listened to: Until I Met You, Mest

Last song you sang: Seasons, Good Charlotte

Last song you sang in the bathroom: none?

Last thing you said: "Sam, whats the fuck are you watching?!"

Last thing you typed in an IM: i dont have aim.

Last person you laughed with: ummm...my Auntie bev

Last person you called: Manny

Last person that called you: Anoushka

Current fingernail/toe nail polish: black and green 

Current favorite CD: Good charlotte, self-titled

Current favorite song: "Hard Headed", Never Heard of It

Current favorite band: Good Charlotte

Currect desktop picture: some thing my lil bro made on Paint

Current shoes: none

Current shoelaces: none

Current socks: none

Current bracelets: 18 billy bracelets

Do you have any posters on your walls? yep

Do you own a calendar? nope.

If you could paint your pet's nails...what color would they be?  black

If you won $100, what would you spend it on? Concert tickets and backstage passes

What's on your desk? I don't have a desk

What color is your room? yellow (ugh)

Do you download songs? yeah

How many songs have you downloaded? lots

What song do you listen to over and over again? any song by GC, Salvation by Rancid, Freak by Silverchair

What's the story behind your username?   Well, there's GCs song "Walk By" that talks about and evil queen, and "riot girls", so i put them together, and voila!  evil_riot_queen

What's the story behind your current screen name? dont have one

Pick a word...poodle or waffle: Poodle "oy with the poodles already" If you watch Gilmore Girls you understand  (hahah, _eyeroll had this here, and Im keeping it 'cause its funny)

Name the top 5 rock stars you'd do: Billy Martin, Daniel Johns, Tim Armstrong, Davey Havok, and Travis Barker...but all the guys of GC, too.

If there was a fire...what are the top 3 things you'd think of first?
Computer
Cds
my GC bible

What would be the top 5 things you'd haul out of the house?
Myself
Cds
my dog
my computer (if i could)
my gc bible</lj-cut>

I'm leaving early tomorrow to go camping.  I won't be back until August 24th, meaning I wont be able to update.
Not that any of you care.
But I'll miss you!
Love y'all!

My Aunty Bev came out here for a surprise visit! I love it when she comes! She's so much fun, she acts like a kid. Yay! I'm gonna watch Phone Booth tonight. It looks kinda stupid, but I really have nothing better to do. I'm gonna watch Halloween H20 tonight, as well. I'm out.

I started reading a book called "The Clash: Return of the Last Gang in Town". It's a biography on The Clash, and it's very interesting.
DisorderRating
Paranoid:Moderate
Schizoid:High
Schizotypal:High
Antisocial:Moderate

Histrionic:High

Avoidant:Low
Dependent:Low
Obsessive-Compulsive:Moderate

-- Personality Disorder Test - Take It! --

Just got back from a weekend of camping, AGAIN.
It was too funny, I was in my mom's car on the way home, and I begged her to let me listen to my music, and she said yes, but we had to listen to GC>
So I put in the self-titled CD, and my mom sings EVERY WORD!  It was hillarious.  And kinda wierd, because my mom cant stand any of my other music.  Im not sure if this is a good thing or a bad thing.

Then she says "If you go to see them in concert, you are so taking me!".  Yeah, right...that'll happen.

Thats about it.  I'm gonna go get a frappuchino with my mom today.  Yummmmy!
Im out.

So fucking bored. My little brother is such an ass. I had to watch him all day. And whats worse, Anoushka sent her little bro over to play with mine, and then she went out, so I was stuck watching both of them all day. I watched Chicken Run again today. I love that movie. Last night, I had a very impure dream about Billy and Daniel Johns doing innapropriate things to eachother. I am a sick, sick girl. They would make a gorgeous couple, though, dontcha think? Yes they would. Okedoke, thats all.

I had to wake up at six this morning to go to the dentist.  Ugh.  
Dentists ammuse me.  They try to make small talk, ask stupid questions. They talk to you like you're their friend, when all you really want is to get the hell outta there.
Thats about it.

Parents are out, I'm stuck watching my little brother.  Watching Chicken Run and drinking coke.
I dont really have much to say.  Im on the phone with Anoushka and she's being a bitch.  As usual.


<lj-cut text="Shitty song/poem-type-thing I wrote"> Its like emptiness inside, no feelings left to hide
need someone to fill this hole, because I feel so alone.

Save me, give me something to hold onto
Give me a reason to live
Because I'm trapped inside my head, 
my heart feels like it's dead
I need something to fill this void

Theres something I want, no idea what it is
I need someone to be here, and take away this fear.

And Ive lost my hold of reality
Losing control of everything
make me whole
Im fading away</lj-cut>

Crappy, huh?  Oh well, I wasnt really aiming for it to be good, I was just reaaally bored.

Thats all.

I just got back from camping. My parents made me two really really long hikes. They were both about three hours long, there and back. I actually managed not to whine about it though, and my family got along this weekend. that's really unusual for our camping trips.   My mom gave me "marscapone cheese" for dessert last night. Little did she know, she had switched around the containers by accident, and she had fed me icing sugar. Meaning I ate a whole bowl of icing sugar. Meaning I DID NOT sleep at all. I was hyper all night.   Im dead tired.   Just saw the new Rancid video! The new Rancid CD comes out August 19th! YAY!   My website just got hosted, I'm really happy about that.   I guess I'm actually having an okay day, except for the fact that I have a killer headache.   Okay, Im done. Gonna go eat some grilled cheese.

check out THIS VIDEO of Billy being all cute, fighting with one of the guys from NFG. So adorable! It makes me wanna hug him:) And THIS PICTURE is great too. It's of Billy being scary, but in a cute way. I love GC circle pitt. Daily GC goodness

Last night was strange.  I was sitting outside in my backyeard at about midnight, all by myself.  I just started bawling.  I was all depressed, and I felt the need to go onto my computer and listen to Dashboard Confessional.  Which is REALLY wierd for me, because I absolutley HATE Dashboard!  
I think I'm an insomniac.  I seriously can't fall asleep until around four in the morning, and then when I do finally fall asleep, it's a restless sleep.  I'm dead tired.
I feel kind of empty.  I want something, but I have no idea what it is.  I'm sad about something, but I'm not sure what.  I almost don't feel anything, and I dont like it.
I'm just feeling lonely.
I guess right now, I'm being what some of you might call "emo".
Life sucks.

It's the last stretch! And my heart.. my heart stays in the lead And we see first, second behind my heart is my mind Third behind my mind is my body. Fourth behind my body is my soul And my heart stays in the lead. Coming around the stretch.. Ah, uh, that was a good one Bob. And rounding here is my heart Imagine you can stay in the lead And come second behind my heart is my mind Third behind my mind is my body Fourth behind my body is my soul My heart stays in the lead.

I hate pop-up adds.  Especially pop-up adds advertising software that gets rid of pop-up adds.
Three people asked me if I'm punk today.
Two said I dressed like Avril Lavigne.
Please, shoot me now.

Other than that, not much to say.
Oh, except, if you havent heard of Shadows Fall, I command you to go download one of their songs.  They're pretty hardcore...my friend Ally told me to check them out, they're awsome.  They have this one song, "Casting Shade", that is so beautiful.  Its an intrumental piece, so amazing.  Another good song is "Destroyer of Senses".  Check them out.

'Tis all.

I am EXTREMELY bored.  My parents' friends are still here.  They all ate burgers and hot dogs right in front of me, while I ate my delicious veggie burger.  Yeah, right...delicious my ass!  It tasted like a damn rice cake wit ketchup!  Ick.
my parents go back to work tomorrow.  Thank god, I'll have the house to myself. 
Hey, if you didnt read that Avril-bashing article I posted, go to my last entry and check it out.  It was actually really well written.
oooooh!  I LOVE this part of the song!! "It's just a fad, part of the, teen, teenage anst brigade..."
Alright, Im out.
I just read this article. It's the best Avril-bashing Ive read, it's great. go read it. My parents are having a barbeque tonight, with their friends and stuff. ugh. Shoot me now.

I'm hella bored.  Manny's at work, so I cant do anything with her right now.  I need to get a job.  But I dont know where I could.  I cant work at fast-food places because of my nose ring.  So basically, my only options are to work at places like GAP and Claire's.  Pssshhhh.  Yeah, like that'll happen.  God, I hate those stores.  I should work at Spencer's.  I could LIVE in Spencer's, that store is a riot!
My mom's making a list of chores for me.  Oh, joy.  I get to vaccuum.  How psyched am I?  Not at all.  
I'm really enjoying this claiming thing.  Check my usr info for my list of claims.
I NEED MANNY TO GET HOME SO I CAN DO SOMETHING!
Im booooored.
waaaaaaah.
someone talk to me!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2"> Yay!  Im havin a good day.  My parents are being nice, and my new "Billy hair" looks awsome!  And I have a new layout, thank you sooooo much, mandolin!  Its awsome!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2">OMG YAY!  I got my hair cut like Billy's.  its just a little bit longer.  Its dyed sorta purple-ish red....its hard to describe but it looks awsome!  It feels wierd, though, because Ive never had my hair this short.

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2">Yay!  My parents decided we dont haveta go camping! happy day!  haha.  Yeah...thats it.  Im bored, I feel like a loner.
Yesterday I went to the mall and my mom gave me money, but she said I couldnt buy a ring for my nose and she wanted to see what I bought, so I couldnt get it...but then Manny bought it for me!  Thank you sooooo much Manny, I cant wait till the 27th when I can take my stud!
I also bought "Answer That and Stay Fashionable" by AFI.
Yep, thats it! 
Oh, one last thing...can you see my layout, with the pics of GC on it?

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2">Well, once again my parents have decided to drag me camping because THEY love the outdoors.  I, however, do not, but they dont care.  So I wont be able to talk to anybody or update until Sunday or Monday.  So see ya then!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2">So I just watched some of the Hard Rock Live thing on my computer at idobi.co  and mtv.com.

Haha, look how many more people were at the HRL then there were at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame!  *sob*  our boys are growing up so fast! *sob* 
lol

OMFG! YAY! there's a new GC poster, and it has all five of them on it! Yay, finally some recognition of Chris! Check it out: i HAVETA get it! oooooooh, and they might post the Hard Rock Live thingy on gccirclepitt, so hopefully Ill get to see it! YAY!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="2"> Well, since I dont have MTV, I was real updet cuz I couldnt watch the Hard Rock Live theng.  but i checked mtv.com, and they have the videos of Hold On and Girls and Boys played on HRL.  As I was watching the video of Hold On, I started crying!  Seriously, I did, because it was so beautiful.  And the whole crowd was singing along, and people were holding lighters, and some were crying.  Gos, and I saw that on my COMPUTER.  Imagine if I actually saw it LIVE?  god, I love them!
<font face="comic sans ms" size="2">New Layout!  Whaddya think?

<font face="comic sans ms" size="1">Hahah!  This is random, but sooo funny!  Today, on the way back from camping, we were in the car, and I saw some horses.  So I asked my parents, "Can we pleeease go horseback riding?  retty please?  Pretty please WITH BILLY ON TOP?!"  Then my mom looks at me all funny, and my dad says "Yeah, thats what Im afraid of:  Billy on top".  HAHA!  hmmmmmm....billy on top doesnt sound so bad right now.  okedoke, im done!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="1">Check out my new icon...snazzy, huh?  Hera18 made it, thanks so much! I looove it!
You know what's so wierd?  yesterday, I was sitting in the car with my family, and I got this urge to start singing "Salvation" by Rancid.  So I opened my mouth to sing "Come on baby, wont you show me what you've got, yeah" but my brother starts singing it at exactly the same time!  Freaky, huh?  I thought it was.  Lol, my brothers only nine, but he knows all of my favorite songs off by heart because I listen to them so much:)
Yep, thats about it....Thanks again for the icon, hera18!
Peace, Love and GC!
-Kat

<font face="comic sans ms" size="1">Im back from camping!  Thank god!  GC is gunna be on combat zone in 11 minutes.  PLEASE let them beat Christina Aguilera!  PLEASE!  Ill die if that whore wins.  Anyways, not much to say...
Um, Manny, im really sorry about spazzing at you in that email, I was in a bad mood and im REALLY sorry.  I had PMS or something.  I was just really pissed off for certain reasons, and I kinda took it out on you.  Im sowweee:(!
Kimmie, im so jealous of you...Chris is GOD!
Okay, thats it!
PEACE!

<font face="comic sans ms" size="1">Im leaving today to go camping, and I wont be back until Sunday....Im gunna miss my computer so much!  You too, Kimmie!  And Manny!  I DONT WANNA GOOOOOO!  *tear*  oh, well...i'll still have GC to keep me company:)
See you sunday!
Kat

<font face="comic sans ms" size="1">m Hmmmm.  A mix of feelings today.  Lets start with the bad news:  They announced the winner of the GC contest, and its not me.  It's someone from Manitoba.  Im pissed off 'cause Im NEVER gonna get to see them!  There's no way they're gonna come here on their fall tour, they never do.  ARG!
Okay, good news:  My order got here today.  I now have a Minor Threat shirt, a Rancid shirt, and a L27 shirt!  I got all excited when it came 'cause I've been waiting SOOOO long for Level27!  i got the batty t-shirt.  You know, the black one with the red bat, the one he wears in TYATH video?  yeah, that one.
MANNY!  I want my CD's back, I miss rancid and The Used.  So can you come over at some point in the next week and give them to me?
Can you see my layout now?  it was all screwed yesterday, but I think I fixed it.
